sectionSubtitle: Explore insights through an analytics lens
ctaText: Want to see more? Check out my GitHub profile for additional projects and code samples.

projects.title: Perry's Ice Cream — Production Line Optimization
projects.shortDescription: Identified hidden capacity losses via regression and time-series analytics. Quantified speed–weight relationships, downtime effects, and restart penalties.
bullets: Analyzed speed, downtime, and SKU mix to identify hidden capacity
Quantified impact of heavy SKUs, long runs, and restarts on throughput
Recommended changes to unlock capacity without new machines

projects.title: Nexus Logistics — Employee Training Analytics
projects.shortDescription: Applied PCA and clustering to reveal learning preference groups. Built data-driven recommendations that improved training completion rates.
bullets: Applied PCA to reduce dimensionality of training metrics
Used K-Means clustering to identify learning preference groups
Delivered recommendations that improved training completion rates

projects.title: Social Media Engagement — Lenskart
projects.shortDescription: Power BI dashboards analyzing influencer campaigns. Achieved 500K impressions and improved reach by 15%.
bullets: Built comprehensive Power BI dashboards for campaign tracking
Analyzed influencer performance across multiple platforms
Achieved 500K impressions and 15% improvement in reach

projects.title: Pricing Strategy & Market Simulation
projects.shortDescription: Built pricing model that boosted revenue and optimized margins. Implemented JIT/FIFO inventory management reducing costs by 25%.
bullets: Developed dynamic pricing model based on demand patterns
Achieved 25% cost reduction while maintaining quality

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction Model
projects.shortDescription: Developed ML model to predict customer churn with 87% accuracy. Enabled proactive retention strategies saving estimated $2M annually.
bullets: Built ensemble model combining XGBoost and Random Forest
Identified top 10 churn indicators from 50+ features
